title: Fisch Tier List
description: Discover the ultimate tier list for fishing rods in Roblox Fisch, detailing the top choices from S Tier to C Tier to enhance your fishing experience.
heading: Fisch Tier List
introText: Discover the ultimate tier list for fishing rods in Roblox Fisch, detailing the top choices from S Tier to C Tier to enhance your fishing experience.

data.itemDescription: Has a 50% chance to apply an 8x multiplier to the value of caught fish, making it one of the most profitable rods in the game
Increases luck by 150% every 30 seconds and has a 20% chance to catch fish with a 4x value multiplier
Available for free upon reaching level 500; has a high chance of catching fish with a mutation that increases their value by 1.5 times
Has the chance to pierce and stun fish during capture; requires 100% Bestiary completion and 150,000C$
Applies a permanent and substantial luck boost to catches; available via Caleia for 190,000
All fish caught are 10% larger; acquired through the Enchanted Alter for 120,000
The only rod capable of withstanding the Brine Pools; costs 20,000C$ from the Desolate Deep
Catches diurnal and nocturnal fish at any time; purchased at Vertigo for 11,000
70% chance to spout spores that apply a Luck IV for 45 seconds; obtained by showing Agaric an Alligator within the Mushroom Swamp
Withstands oceanic pressure for deeper-found fish; bought from Roslit for 7,000
Provides a 20% chance for caught fish to be Rainbow; obtainable from the Travelling Merchant for 110,000
Stronger than the Lucky Rod and has a higher chance to catch rarer fish; obtained from Roslit for 12,750
Increases luck by 50%; obtained via the 2024 Halloween Event
Every 10 catches, the player has a 25% chance to find a Treasure Map on their next catch; obtained from Treasure Chests
Attracts crates and drops; bought from Terrapin for 15,000
Quicker than the Fast Rod, catches fish swiftly; bought from Roslit for 14,000
Capable of fishing in lava; obtained by giving an Orc a Pufferfish
Increased chance of catching rare fish; bought from Starter Island/Moosewood for 5,250
Easy to hold but with shorter range; bought from Starter Island/Moosewood for 2,000
60% chance all caught fish will be golden; obtained via Travelling Merchant for 55,000
Not strong but has the furthest reach in Fisch; obtained for 4,500
Catches fish more quickly; bought from Starter Island/Moosewood for 5,500
Simple but gets the job done; bought from Moosewood for 900
Slightly more sturdy compared to the beginnerâ€™s rod; bought from Moosewood for 300
